message.body: Hey Glenn u want me to send u what I get done tonight tomorrow morning or should I just wait til I have a big chunk of it done?
If it's not a big deal, I'd be curious to see what you did.
yeah I think its better to keep updating small increments so its easier for me if u wanna change something
I haven't put it tower of Pisa yet but I must say I really love the castle
Ok, if you're really feeling the castle, then let's go with it.
Its up to you. I couldn't really find a good Pisa tower without tourists in front of it but I only gave it a quick look. I was just trying to get the cuts for second verse today
I wasn't totally sure about the tower myself, and Jacob said he really liked all the backgrounds you chose, so I'm ok with keeping the castle.
Cool. I'll get u an update tomorrow morning. I'll most likely be up early and working on it all day. I won't be at work tomorrow. Might be able to wrap it up by end up the weekend
Cool,
The video didn't process last night so I'll send you a version later today. Sorry bout that.
No problem.
U guys on Facebook or anything?
Cool
I'm gonna stop editing for now before I do too much before you see it. I should have a copy for u in a few hours
Just got a chance to watch it. Let me watch it again later tonight when I see Jacob, then I'll make some notes. It's definitely looking good.
Sounds good
Im not really in love with the Cadillac. Going to try and find something better still

Hey Dan, a few things on the latest edit: I like that the video is fast paced, but I think there might be a bit too much shifting from one image to another in verse 2 (1:12-1:36). Also, can we get a bit more screen time for the renaissance era? I defini

OK so you like less cutting in the second. Yeah I was thinking cut up the dance scene too. And yeah I haven't added the drinks yet. So the modern scenes are cut enough for you aside from adding drinks at end?
Yeah, a bit less cutting in the second. And yeah, I think the modern stuff is good, apart from throwing in a few seconds of drinking.
What about end where I have I guys put Ur instruments down and walk away after song stops...keep or cut that out?

I was trying to come up with some 50's background ideas, but I'm not having much luck with that. If you YouTube Elvis on the Ed Sullivan show, you'll see he had music notes in the background. We could maybe do something like that.
OK I didn't look at those links u sent yet
I'm not sure how useful they'll be. I just thought maybe we could give the impression of one of those old tv appearances.
I'll take a look
Lemme know if you want me to cut down second verse more

Hey Dan, I'm really liking this. The second verse looked good to me, and so did the rest of the video. One suggestion I have is to find some place where you can put in a very brief clip of the renaissance guys drinking. This way, for the sake of the st
OK cool. I will fix up the timing of the cuts send u a version tonight
